about.summary:
7+ years. Zero fluff. Infinite scale.

I don't just write code; I build digital engines that don't know how to quit. As a Lead Full-Stack Engineer, I've spent the last decade turning "impossible" architectures into high-performance reality. From the invisible magic of backend systems to the "pixel-perfect" polish of modern frontends, I bridge the gap between business dreams and technical muscle.

üõ†Ô∏è My Secret Sauce:

The Big Picture: I own the entire SDLC. I don't just ship features; I streamline the factory that builds them using CI/CD pipelines and GenAI-powered workflows.

Data-Driven DNA: I'm obsessed with observability. If it moves, I track it. I use custom scripting and real-time dashboards to hunt down bugs before they even realize they're bugs.

UI/UX with an Edge: I believe a backend is only as good as the interface it feeds. I build modular, intuitive frontends that users actually want to touch.

Business Mindset: Tech for tech's sake is a hobby. Tech for growth is a mission. I align every architectural decision with the bottom line.

experience.title: Technology Lead
experience.description: As a high-velocity Tech Lead, I orchestrated the delivery of 20+ features across 7 codebases and 3 tech stacks in just 3 months, while simultaneously boosting SEO performance by 20% and slashing technical debt by 35% through Agentic AI and proactive system optimization.
achievements: Demonstrated leadership in feature development and optimization for a team of 6, resulting in a 20% improvement in Google Search Console listings across 20 high-traffic websites.
Spearheaded a codebase refactoring initiative, reducing technical debt and improving SonarQube compliance by 35% and resolving package vulnerabilities.
Automated technical backlog identification by using agentic AI, reducing planning time by 30%.
Devised innovative solutions to feature requests, that helped identify deeper systemic issues and improve product reliability and reduce defects by at least 15 percent.
Proactively monitored, triaged and fixed production defects utilizing Datadog and GTM for real-user monitoring, analytics, and rapid troubleshooting.
Pioneered LLM-assisted documentation and runbook development, for effective knowledge base creation and streamlined the onboarding of new engineers.
